title: A yobi kisdam am bee sadaka

Diga jonta ngam kuugal maada ngam amin
2: Hoore am fu maajum! Hoosu boo bernde am
Bee hoore am fuu mi hokkite.
Mi de’iti gal Ruuhu, be sembe maada.
E wolde nde nasty yam berde.
3: Anniya am ngoota tan, haa mi hebba yonki.
4: Innde ma tan Yeesu, tammi hisnugo yam.
E kuuje maa buri fuu haa am.
Babi mi laarete, tammunde am mawnde,
Haa gal kabe, haa gal naodumji.

title: To a linyi taaku maada

title: Baddi be yeesu krist

title: War ha yeesu

ton mi hebi ha nder bernde

title: Jodu be am

title: Yeesu badi wartugo

title: Burdum ha yeesu

title: Teddingo allah

title: Ummatore yimbe allah

title: Timminol sodol
1: Yecu wolde Yeesu , yecu dum fajiri
Yecu dum nyaloma, be asiri fu

3: To a huwi boddum, a tammi larugo

Sa’i badi timmugo, ha en wawan huwgo

title: Sobabe ngurte ha nder nyibre
1: Ngam ha nder hakke o halkan fu

3: E min kawtan be hisnabe fu

title: Mobture hisnabe

2: Diga lesdi fu, be mobtoto to

title: Hakke am hosama gal kisnowo

title: Mi don tefa jam be endam

title: Mi don be mada

2: Yeesu-Krist mo Baba yide dowi yam nder lawol ngol

3: Huwugo kugal jaumirawo, renugo wartol mako
Ekkitago andugo mo nder mango mako

4: Ha aljana Allah amin, ha ton gondi men timan

Gokali min be nawdum fu salake har abada

title: Zunubajo mi hurgete
1: Amma ngam ha kebba a hissa

title: Yimre suwam
4: En ngette Allah ngam kisdam mako,

title: Bernde men seyake ngam yeesu
1: Be jam, be welwelo tokka lawol ma,

2: Ko caddum lati ha nder lawol amin
3: Yeesu war law hokkago en siwtaru,
Min donno rena ma nder yide.

title: Babare fu ha yeesu krist
1: Moy umminan mi sa’i mi do’i,
